profile.name: Vijaykumar Karthikeyan
profile.title: Founder, Developer, and Researcher
profile.bio: Hi, I'm Vijay! I like science, soccer, and pandas. I am a current second-year undergraduate studying Bioengineering and Computer Science at UCLA. I am the Co-founder and CTO of Cogenesis, Inc.

experiences.title: Co-Founder,CTO
experiences.description: Transforming Biological Image Analysis with Artificial Intelligence
achievements: Incubated in Founder's, Inc. and Startup UCLA.

experiences.title: Undergraduate Student
experiences.description: Studying Bioengineering with a Technical Breadth in Computer Science.
achievements: Undergraduate Student Researcher at UCLA Bioengineering
Involved in Biomedical Engineering Society and VEST @ UCLA
